= Bash Scripting =
My notes for shell scripting and usage. Includes terminal commands.
*Commands take regexes(this is called globbing)! You can run "rm OneDrive(asterisk)" and it will remove OneDrive1, OneDrive2 and OneDrive3.*

== Intro ==
Bash is a shell. What is a shell?
It's a program that exposes the os functionality, hence the name.
A shell script is a program to be *interpreted* as if run from a CLI.
